entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
